newsitem.title: UK: Inspec says trade in line with expectations.
newsitem.headline: Inspec says trade in line with expectations.

text.p: British specialist chemicals company Inspec Plc said on Wednesday demand was firm in most of its businesses and current trading was "well in line with market expectations".

"Whilst the present strength of sterling continues to present us with a significant challenge, this is being offset by organic growth, improvements in pricing and raw material purchasing, and strict control of fixed costs," the group said in a statement.
Inspec said it was pleased with the performance of its Shell Fine Chemicals acquisition.
It also said that cash generation, gearing and interest cover were better than planned.
